text: e public async Task SetChartDataAsync(BoardInfo boardInfo, IInspectionItem item, IInspectionItemResult itemResult) { try { if (itemResult is null || boardInfo is null || item is null || itemResult is null || item.Result is null || item?.Result.Any() is false) return; var itemResults = item.Result.Where(x => x.MeasureType == itemResult.MeasureType).ToList(); var control = GetChartControl(itemResults.FirstOrDefault()); this.TrendChartType = control?.TrendChartType ?? TrendChartType.None; base.ChartType = control?.ChartType ?? ChartType.None; this.CurrentChartControl = control; if (control != null) { await control.SetChartDataAsync(boardInfo, item, itemResult); } } catch (Exception ex) { MessageBox . Show(ex.ToString()); } }
